extendedInfo.description: =================================================IMPORTANT: CLZ Music is NOT a stand-alone app!This is an add-on for Music Collector for PC or Mac.(available for $29.95 here: http://www.collectorz.com/music/ )You need Music Collector to catalog your music collection and EXPORT data and images to this CLZ Music for Android.** Without Music Collector, this app is useless! **==============================================================Are you using Collectorz.com's Music Collector to catalog your personal music collection?Then CLZ Music is a great companion, to browse, sort andsearch your music collection (and your wish list!) on your Android device.Just use the Export to CLZ Music feature in Music Collector toexport your existing database (including images) to this Android app.Features:* Import your collection data and images from the Windows or Mac edition  - Use Wi-Fi to transfer directly from Windows or Mac to your iPhone.  - Or: Export to a file in the Win/Mac version, then copy the file to   		your Android's SD card.* Browse your In Collection items, your Wish List, or your entire database,   using the 3 main tabs on the top left: All, Collection, Wish List* View your album lists in 2 different views:  - List : showing a small cover image, artist, title, year, index nr & status.  - Thumbnail Wall: just cover image thumbnails, but lots of em.* Sort your album lists by Artist, Title, Year, Index, asc. or desc.* Search your database by Artist, Title, Track Title or Barcode* Group your items into folders. Choose from:   Artist, Genre, Composer, Label, Year, Format, Location, Rating and more...* Tap an album in any view to go to the Album Details page:  - Cover image, artist, title, track list, etc.. and your personal information.  - Use the Prev/Next go the previous or next album, or just swipe.  - Shake iPhone to go to a random album in your current list.  - Choose from 4 styles: Blue, Black, Orange, White* Tap small cover image on Details Page to go the Large Cover Page:	- Use the Prev/Next go the previous or next album, or just swipe.	- Tap the image to return to Details Page.* Supports Portrait and Landscape modes in all views and pages.REQUIREMENTS:- Music Collector 9.2 for Windows (or newer). or- Music Collector 3.4 for Mac OS X (or newer)RECOMMENDED (needed to transfer data over Wi-Fi):- Wi-Fi connection to the same local network that your desktop computer is in.- Apple Bonjour service.

reviews.title: Good app that works
reviews.comment: I\'ve had the desktop and iPhone versions for several years and they worked well. When I first started using them I had trouble syncing over wifi but that was fixed. The Android app on the Samsung S4 has worked very well, no issues syncing and it looks great on the phone.  I have about 1500 albums in my library both CDs and Records.  Great program and the app seems to work well on the 4S.
reviews.author: Mike Forbes

reviews.title: Big disappointment
reviews.comment: Why this does not sync with the catalog I have online? Similar how the desktop application works. Why do I need to actually connect to my PC to get catalog synchronized?  With current functionality and requirement to have purchased desktop application, I do not understand why people should pay for this.
reviews.author: Tomi Huhtakallio

reviews.title: Android support
reviews.comment: Be aware before buying this app, that it does not have the full functionality that the ios app has, collectorz don\'t seem to think that android devices need as much support as ios!!!!! I have been using there desktop software for years and can highly recommened but until they start supporting this app avoid at all costs.
reviews.author: Kenneth Luke

reviews.title: Just what they say...
reviews.comment: This program does just what they say it does.  It is as others have noted very basic.  It would be a bit better if they add the functionality to list by \"track title\" (track titles are currently included in the album data).  It would also be nice if the \"songwriter\" field was included (for listing(s) and/or search).  That said, the PC side of this program allows for those and almost any other feature you\'d care to reference your cataloged collection with.  I am currently adding my (approximately) 2,500 albums and 2,000 CDs, and have had no problems yet.  When I am done with that I will be adding all of my own recordings from DAT.    It is nice having this inventory with me when I am away from my PC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unstable!
reviews.comment: Very unstable on my Galaxy SIII. When I make a minor change in the database and try to update the application crashes. Only solution is to clear the data and make a full restore of the application.   Thomas
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Requires retagging your entire collection w/a non-standard tag in order to view your notes & even then they are truncated. I would pass on this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but basic
reviews.comment: Good app for basic need when carrying your catalog with you. Still more export data is needed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be better if you could scan barcodes with your camera, every other app does it....really liked the pc software that comes with this...
reviews.author: A Google User
